name: MagicWrapper
summary: Magic Wrapper is an Objective-C client/wrapper for M:tgDb.
description: Magic Wrapper is an Objective-C client/wrapper for [M:tgDb], the Magic the Gathering open database project. It consists of an API wrapper, responsible for the network calls (``MTGAPIWrapper``), requests classes (subclasses of the ``MTGRequest`` class), and classes for cards and card sets (``MTGCard`` and ``MTGCardSet``).
